700397f-a.title: Bronx: Albany Crescent - Heath Avenue
700397f-a.text:
Albany Crescent, west from Heath to Bailey Aves. The 5-story
building (left), at the S.W. corner of Heath Ave., bears No. 3021 on
the latter, and the building adjoining it is at the S.E. corner of
Bailey Ave. IIn the center background appears the 3-story fire house
of Fire Engine No. 81 and Hook and Ladder No. 46, bearing Noa. 3027:
3029 Bailey Ave. The frame dwelling adjoining it to the south is
No. 3025.
About 1924.
Gift of Joseph P. Day.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
